page.description: The .GET_JUSTIFICATION() method full justifies text in an RTF memo object.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example returns the justification mode in an RTF field in an open form.
section.example: dim obj as P obj = :Customer_Information:rtfmemofield.this obj.rtf.insert_text("This is RTF text") obj.rtf.full_justify() ? obj.rtf.get_justification() = "Full"
